value.description: Noam - Add competition validation before proposal +update indication
value.label: Update Opportunity Stage

fields.name: Please_Close_opp
fields.fieldText: To close the Opportunity please go to the Opportunity page and click on "Close Opportunity Request"

fields.name: competition_message
fields.fieldText:
Dear owner,

Before moving to the next stage, please make sure that all of the competitive information and data is filled in the competition object (Section under "Strategic Plan" tab called "Competition").

For any related questions, feel free to reach out to the competitive intelligence team.

fields.name: Check_if_competitive
fields.fieldText:
Dear owner,

This opportunity isn't marked as Competitive.

Please approve your choice for competitive indication

fields.name: Is_this_opportunity_Competitive
fields.fieldText: Is this opportunity Competitive?

fields.name: Copy_1_of_Contract_Sign_Date_Not_Valid
fields.fieldText:
Contract sign date value is not valid.


Please Reach out to deal desk and update the contract start date before moving to the next stage.

fields.name: Competitive_error
fields.fieldText:
This opportunity has been marked as Competitive,

Please click next to create a new competitor

fields.name: Copy_1_of_Copy_1_of_Add_decisionMaker
fields.fieldText: Please select a "Decision Maker" contact role before progressing to the next stage

fields.name: intiltxt
fields.fieldText: Please select an "Initial Communicator" contact role before progressing to the next stage

fields.name: addtiltxt
fields.fieldText: There must be an Initial Communicator, a Decision Maker and an additional Contact Role before moving to the next stage.

fields.fieldText: Role

fields.name: RoleChoice
fields.fieldText: Role

fields.name: Copy_1_of_insert_sign_date
fields.fieldText:
Contract Sign Date is Missing.

Before moving to the next stage, Please reach out to deal desk to complete the IronClad Process for Contract Sign date.

fields.name: No_ironclad_error_screen
fields.fieldText:
You have No IronClad Document on this Opportunity.

Please go to the Quote and create an Ironclad Document from the Contract Generation component.

fields.name: Create_IH_message
fields.fieldText: Please create an Implementation handoff record from the Opportunity page, before Proceeding to Implement Stage

fields.name: Complete_IH_Message
fields.fieldText: ﻿Please complete the related Implementation Handoff, before Proceeding to Implement Stage

fields.name: No_quote_message
fields.fieldText:
You can't proceed to the next stage before creating a Primary Quote for this Opportunity.

Please click next to a create new quote.

fields.name: Quote_error
fields.fieldText:
You can't proceed to the next stage before the primary quote is approved.

Please click next to move to the quote page and Submit for Approval.

fields.name: Must_approve_quote
fields.fieldText:
You can't proceed to the next stage before creating a Primary Quote for this Opportunity.

Please click next to a create new quote.

fields.name: SuccessMessage
fields.fieldText: The Opportunity stage has been successfully updated
